Articles.Content:
With the stock system, you can use only one 5-star engineer to an endless number of drills and ISRU, having no benefit of adding more. I'm trying to make a mod to mine enriched uranium to be returned for profit, and this mechanic makes things not very interesting.

Is there a way to change that?  The mod The Gold Standard added benefit of having one scientist to a certain resource, which makes things a little better:
